import React from "react"; import { Link, NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import Dropdown from "react-bootstrap/Dropdown"; import logo from "../utils/images/movie-logo2.png"; const NavBar = ({ user }) => { return (
{/* Movies */} Movies All Movies Favorite Movies Customers Rentals {/* if we do not have a user */} {!user && ( <> Login Register )} {/* if we do have a user */} {user && ( <> Logout Welcome {user.name}! )}
); }; export default NavBar;
